description: After applying the updates identified in KB5043080, KB5043076, KB5043067, and KB5043064 for Windows 11 and 10, users may experience unusual behavior related to system privilege settings. Systems running builds 10.0.26100.1742, 10.0.22631.4169, 10.0.22621.4169, and 10.0.22000.3197 might show signs of unexpected elevation of privileges. This behavior could manifest as sudden access to restricted system areas or greater control over administrative functions than intended. Additionally, trusted applications may exhibit anomalous behavior, potentially causing disruptions in system performance and workflow, leading to confusion for administrators and end-users alike. It is critical to monitor these systems post-update to ensure operational integrity.
